Entry.name: AA
Entry.value: Item Accepted - Order Forwarded to Alternate Supplier Location

Entry.name: AR
Entry.value: Item Accepted and Released for Shipment

Entry.name: BP
Entry.value: Item Accepted - Partial Shipment, Balance Backordered

Entry.name: R1
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Not a Contract Item

Entry.name: R2
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Invalid Item Product Number

Entry.name: R3
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Invalid Unit of Issue

Entry.name: R4
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Contract Item not Available

Entry.name: R5
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Reorder Item as a Just in Time (JIT) Order

Entry.name: R6
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Reorder Item as an Extended Delivery Order (EDO)

Entry.name: R7
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Reorder Item as a Drop Shipment

Entry.name: R8
Entry.value: Item Rejected, Reorder Item as a Surge Order
